/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, providing a vibrant contrast to the clear blue sky dotted with fluffy white clouds. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. On the right side of the street, there's a building with a red roof, adding a pop of color to the otherwise green landscape. The image appears to have been captured using a fisheye lens, which gives it a unique, wide-angle view.
